week1: Foundation week: Focus on technique, moderate weight (65-70% 1RM), full body workouts 4x/week. Establish baseline strength and movement patterns.
week2: Volume accumulation week: Increase total sets by 20%, introduce progressive overload. Target 3-4 sets per major movement pattern, slight weight increase.
week3: Intensity peak week: Increase weight 5-7%, reduce rep range, focus on strength development. Lower volume, higher perceived exertion.
week4: Deload week: Reduce volume by 40-50%, maintain technique, use 50-60% of previous weeks' weights. Active recovery and technique refinement.
